trans-unit.source: Provides properties for getting the information about the application, such as the version number, description, loaded assemblies, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 提供取得應用程式相關資訊的屬性，例如版本號碼、描述、已載入組件等。

trans-unit.source: Some of the properties exposed by the `My.Application.Info` object return the application's assembly information.
trans-unit.target: 部分屬性所公開`My.Application.Info`物件傳回應用程式的組件資訊。

trans-unit.source: To set the information in the application's assembly, you must use the **Assembly Information** dialog box, accessible from the **Application** pane of the **Project Designer**.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定應用程式的組件中的資訊，您必須使用**組件資訊**對話方塊中，從存取**應用程式**窗格**專案設計工具**.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.Info` object provides functionality similar to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> class but is scoped to give quick access to the most common properties.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.Info`物件會提供類似的功能<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo>類別，但範圍的最常見內容以便快速存取。

trans-unit.source: Other properties, such as `LoadedAssemblies`, provide access to the current state of the application.
trans-unit.target: 其他屬性，例如`LoadedAssemblies`，提供應用程式的目前狀態存取。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.Info.Version` property to display the version of the application.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.Version`屬性來顯示應用程式的版本。

trans-unit.source: The assembly for which to obtain the information.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得資訊的組件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AssemblyInfo" /> class with the specified assembly information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的組件資訊，初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AssemblyInfo" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name, without the extension, of the assembly file for the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式之組件檔案的名稱 (不包括副檔名)。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the file name.
The `My.Application.Info.AssemblyName` property gets the name of the file containing the manifest.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.Info.AssemblyName`屬性會取得包含資訊清單的檔案名稱。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.Info.AssemblyName` property to display the name of the application.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.AssemblyName`屬性來顯示應用程式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
trans-unit.target: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

trans-unit.source: Gets the company name associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得與應用程式關聯的公司名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that contains the company name associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，包含與應用程式相關聯的公司名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.Info.CompanyName` property gets the company name associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.Info.CompanyName`屬性會取得與應用程式相關聯的公司名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can change the company name by changing the value for **Company** in the **Assembly Information** dialog box, accessible from the **Application** pane of the **Project Designer**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更的值來變更公司名稱**公司**中**組件資訊**對話方塊中，從存取**應用程式**窗格**專案設計工具**。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.Info.CompanyName` property to display the company name associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.CompanyName`屬性來顯示應用程式相關聯的公司名稱。

trans-unit.source: The assembly does not have an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyCompanyAttribute" /> attribute.
Gets the copyright notice associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得與應用程式相關聯的著作權注意事項。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the copyright notice associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，包含與應用程式相關聯的著作權注意事項。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.Info.Copyright` property gets the copyright notice associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.Info.Copyright`屬性取得與應用程式相關聯的著作權注意事項。

trans-unit.source: You can change the copyright notice by changing the value for **Copyright** in the **Assembly Information** dialog box, accessible from the **Application** pane of the **Project Designer**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由變更的值變更的著作權注意事項**著作權**中**組件資訊**對話方塊中，從存取**應用程式**窗格**專案設計工具**。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.Info.Copyright` property to display the company name associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.Copyright`屬性來顯示應用程式相關聯的公司名稱。

trans-unit.source: The assembly does not have an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyCopyrightAttribute" /> attribute.
Gets the description associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得與應用程式相關聯的描述。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the description associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，包含與應用程式相關聯的描述。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.Info.Description` property gets the description associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.Info.Description`屬性會取得與應用程式相關聯的描述。

trans-unit.source: You can change the description by changing the value for **Description** in the **Assembly Information** dialog box, accessible from the **Application** pane of the **Project Designer**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由變更的值變更的描述**描述**中**組件資訊**對話方塊中，從存取**應用程式**窗格**專案設計工具**。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.Info.Description` property to display the description associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.Description`屬性來顯示與應用程式相關聯的描述。

trans-unit.source: The assembly does not have an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyDescriptionAttribute" /> attribute.
Gets the directory where the application is stored.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存應用程式的目錄。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that contains the directory where the application is stored.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，包含儲存應用程式的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.Info.DirectoryPath` property gets the directory where the application is stored.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.Info.DirectoryPath`屬性會取得儲存應用程式的目錄。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.Info.DirectoryPath` property to display the directory path where the application is stored.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.DirectoryPath`屬性來顯示應用程式所在的目錄路徑。

trans-unit.source: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
trans-unit.target: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all assemblies loaded by the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式所載入之所有組件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> containing all the assemblies loaded by the application.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />，包含應用程式所載入之所有組件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.Info.LoadedAssemblies` property is similar to the <xref:System.AppDomain.GetAssemblies%2A> method.

trans-unit.target: Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.Info.LoadedAssemblies` property to display the assemblies loaded by the application.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.LoadedAssemblies`屬性來顯示組件載入應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your Windows Forms application has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control named `ListBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要 Windows Form 應用程式沒有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項，名為`ListBox1`。

trans-unit.source: The application domain is not loaded.
trans-unit.target: 未載入應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: Gets the product name associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得與該應用程式相關聯的產品名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the product name associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，包含與該應用程式相關聯的產品名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.Info.ProductName` property gets the product name associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.Info.ProductName`屬性會取得與應用程式相關聯的產品名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can change the product name by changing the value for **Product** in the **Assembly Information** dialog box, accessible from the **Application** pane of the **Project Designer**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由變更的值變更的產品名稱**產品**中**組件資訊**對話方塊中，從存取**應用程式**窗格**專案設計工具**。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.Info.ProductName` property to display the product name associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.ProductName`屬性來顯示應用程式相關聯的產品名稱。

trans-unit.source: The assembly does not have an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute" /> attribute.

trans-unit.target: 取得目前的堆疊追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the current stack-trace information.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，包含目前堆疊追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: The return value can be <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.

The `My.Application.Info.StackTrace` property lists method calls in reverse chronological order—that is, it describes the most recent method call first, and it lists each method call on the stack on a separate line.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.Info.StackTrace`屬性會列出依反向時間順序的方法呼叫 — 也就是第一次，它會描述最新的方法呼叫，並列出每個方法呼叫，在不同行堆疊上的。

trans-unit.source: However, the `My.Application.Info.StackTrace` property might not report as many method calls as expected, due to code transformations that occur during optimization.
trans-unit.target: 不過，`My.Application.Info.StackTrace`屬性可能不會報告為多個方法呼叫，如預期般，因為發生在最佳化期間的程式碼轉換。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the stack-trace information is used for debugging applications.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，堆疊追蹤資訊會用於偵錯應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The stack-trace information for each method call is formatted as follows:
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫的堆疊追蹤資訊的格式如下：

trans-unit.source: The literal "at" is preceded by three spaces, and the literals "in" and ":line" are omitted if debug symbols are not available.
trans-unit.target: 常值"at"前方會有三個空格，而 「 中 」 的常值和 「: 列 」 無法偵錯符號時，會省略。

trans-unit.source: The placeholders `FullClassName`, `MethodName`, `MethodParams`, `FileName`, and `LineNumber` are replaced by actual values, defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 預留位置`FullClassName`， `MethodName`， `MethodParams`， `FileName`，和`LineNumber`會取代實際的值，定義如下：

trans-unit.source: The full name of the class, including the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 類別，包括命名空間的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: The list of parameter type/name pairs.
trans-unit.target: 參數類型/名稱組的清單。

trans-unit.source: Each pair is separated by a comma (,).
trans-unit.target: 以逗號 （，） 區隔每個配對。

trans-unit.source: This information is omitted if *MethodName* takes zero parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果，則會忽略這項資訊*MethodName*採用零參數。

trans-unit.source: The name of the source file where the *MethodName* method is declared.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的來源名稱*MethodName*方法宣告。

trans-unit.source: This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法使用的偵錯符號，則會忽略這項資訊。

trans-unit.source: The number of the line in *FileName* that contains the source code from *MethodName* for the instruction that is on the call stack.
trans-unit.target: 在行號*FileName* ，其中包含從原始程式碼*MethodName*呼叫堆疊上的指示。

trans-unit.source: This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法使用的偵錯符號，則會忽略這項資訊。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Applicaiton.Info.StackTrace` property provides functionality similar to the <xref:System.Environment.StackTrace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `My.Applicaiton.Info.StackTrace`屬性會提供類似的功能<xref:System.Environment.StackTrace%2A>屬性。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.Info.StackTrace` property to display the stack trace of the application from the point at which the code executes.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.StackTrace`屬性來顯示應用程式從點執行的程式碼的堆疊追蹤。

trans-unit.source: The requested stack-trace information is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 要求的堆疊追蹤資訊超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: Controls the ability to access information in the file paths.
trans-unit.target: 控制存取的檔案路徑中資訊的能力。

trans-unit.source: Gets the title associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得與應用程式相關聯的標題。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyTitleAttribute" /> associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，包含與應用程式相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyTitleAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.Info.Title` property gets the title associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.Info.Title`屬性會取得與應用程式相關聯的標題。

trans-unit.source: You can change the title by changing the value for **Title** in the **Assembly Information** dialog box, accessible from the **Application** pane of the **Project Designer**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由變更的值來變更此標題**標題**中**組件資訊**對話方塊中，從存取**應用程式**窗格**專案設計工具**。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.Info.Title` property to display the title associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.Title`屬性來顯示應用程式相關聯的標題。

trans-unit.source: The assembly does not have an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyTitleAttribute" /> attribute.
Gets the trademark notice associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得與應用程式相關聯的商標注意事項。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the trademark notice associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，包含與應用程式相關聯的商標注意事項。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.Info.Trademark` property gets the trademark notice associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.Info.Trademark`屬性會取得與應用程式相關聯的商標。

trans-unit.source: You can change the trademark notice by changing the value for **Trademark** in the **Assembly Information** dialog box, accessible from the **Application** pane of the **Project Designer**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由變更的值變更商標**商標**中**組件資訊**對話方塊中，從存取**應用程式**窗格**專案設計工具**。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.Info.Trademark` property to display the trademark information associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.Trademark`屬性來顯示應用程式相關聯的商標資訊。

trans-unit.source: The assembly does not have an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyTrademarkAttribute" /> attribute.
Gets the version number of the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式的版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Version" /> object containing the version number of the application.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Version" /> 物件，包含應用程式的版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.Info.Version` property gets a <xref:System.Version> object containing the version number of the application.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.Info.Version`屬性會取得<xref:System.Version>物件，其中包含應用程式的版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Version.Major%2A>, <xref:System.Version.Minor%2A>, <xref:System.Version.Build%2A>, and <xref:System.Version.Revision%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Version> object to access specific version information about the application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Version.Major%2A>， <xref:System.Version.Minor%2A>， <xref:System.Version.Build%2A>，和<xref:System.Version.Revision%2A>屬性<xref:System.Version>存取特定版本應用程式相關資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: ClickOnce-deployed applications should use the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentVersion%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.Deployment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ClickOnce 部署應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentVersion%2A>屬性<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.Deployment%2A>屬性。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.Info.Version` property to display the version of the application.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.Version`屬性來顯示應用程式的版本。

trans-unit.source: The application does not have sufficient permissions to access the assembly version.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式沒有足夠的使用權限可以存取組件版本。

trans-unit.source: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
trans-unit.target: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

trans-unit.source: Gets the amount of physical memory mapped to the process context.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應至處理程序內容的實體記憶體數量。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Long" /> containing the number of bytes of physical memory mapped to the process context.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Long" />，包含對應至處理序內容之實體記憶體的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.Info.WorkingSet` property has the same behavior as the <xref:System.Environment.WorkingSet%2A> property.
This property always returns zero for Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠會傳回零 Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.Info.WorkingSet` property to display the number of bytes of physical memory mapped to the application.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.WorkingSet`屬性來顯示對應至應用程式的實體記憶體的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: A situation in which partial trust exists and the user lacks necessary permissions.
trans-unit.target: 發生部分信任以及使用者缺少必要權限的狀況。

trans-unit.source: Controls the ability to access all environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 控制存取所有環境變數的能力。
